document_data.name: House of Nasr
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Nasr''', also called the '''People of the Eagle''', was a large desert tribe of [[Zakharan pantheon|enlightened]] [[Al-Badia]] found in the northern reaches of the [[High Desert]] of [[west Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p38-39">
document_data.Base of Operations: The [[Desert Mosque]] was maintained by this tribe.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p38-39"/>
document_data.Organization: Some 3,000 [[Zakharan (ethnicity)|Zakharans]], split among thirty different clans, made up the House of Nasr.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p38-39"/>
document_data.Activities: Each year a different clan was entrusted with protecting and maintaining the Desert Mosque.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p38-39"/>
document_data.Members: Sheikh [[Nadia umm Fadela]] lead the House of Nasr in 1367 DR.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p38-39"/>
